# [Interview #1134: San Diego Comic Con 2015, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1134#3)

#### Cognizantastic

Is Calamity a Shard?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Anything that exists or takes place on any version of Earth is not cosmere.
